== Main Inclusion Report for libssh ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' <nowiki>[[http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/main/libs/libssh]]</nowiki>; Currently in New, will accept into Main temporarily to not block other work.
# ''Rationale:''
** With libssh, you can remotely execute programs, transfer files, use a secure and transparent tunnel for your remote programs.
** Build dependency of KDE 4.4, required for kio_sftp slave
** 
0. ''Security:''
** <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=libssh|CVE entries]]</nowiki>: 0 results
** <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=libssh|Secunia history]]</nowiki>: 0 results
0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Licensed on <nowiki>[[http://creativecommons.org/licenses/LGPL/2.1/|LGPL]]</nowiki>
** Uses CDBS to build
0. ''Dependencies:''
** cdbs, debhelper (>= 7), cmake (>= 2.6), libssl-dev, libz-dev, doxygen
** Everything is available in main
0. ''Maintenance:''
** Ubuntu MOTU Developers are responsible for this package in Ubuntu and Debian maintainer is Laurent Bigonville <bigon [at] debian.org>
